Package jsky.app.jskycat

Contains classes for the JSkyCat application, which allows you to browse images and catalogs.

See:

JSkyCat Main class for the JSkyCat application.

JSkyCatVersion  
 

Package jsky.app.jskycat Description

Contains classes for the JSkyCat application, which allows you to browse images and catalogs.

Usage: java JSkyCat [-internalframes] [-shownavigator] [imageFileOrUrl]

The jsky.catalog.skycat.config property defines the Skycat style catalog config file to use. (The default uses the ESO Skycat config file).

If the -internalframes option is given, the application uses Windows style internal frames.

If -shownavigator is specified, the catalog navigator window is displayed on startup.

The imageFileOrUrl argument may be an image file or URL to load.
